creator: ondrap@penguin.cz
text:
After taking a .fo generated from DocBook XSL, there were some unresolved id's.
It seems to me that fop doesn't support id= in other elements then fo:block,
although it seems to me that it can appear in other elements as well.

creator: aweiss@yahoo-inc.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4652 ***

Errorneously marked as duplicate.
Referring to an id of a page-sequence still results in a NullPointerException.
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
Correction: page-number-citation referring to page-sequence ids are still
empty.

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
This is fixed in FOP 0.91beta but on the other side this release doesn't support
"id" attributes on all other FOs, yet. For a list of those FOs that don't
support the "id" attribute, please checkout the release notes at:
http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/relnotes.html#FOP+0.91+beta
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
